mapper.select: select * from orders where itemCode = ${itemCode} and (dateStr like '${dateStr}%' or dateEnd like '${dateStr}%') and (state='예약대기' or state='예약완료' or state='입금대기' or state='방문완료') order by orderCode desc
select count(orderCode) from orders where itemCode = #{itemCode} and ((#{start} <= dateStr) or (#{start} <= dateEnd )) and ((#{end} >= dateStr) or (#{end} >= dateEnd))

select * from orders where itemCode = #{itemCode} and ((#{start} <= dateStr) or (#{start} < dateEnd )) and ((#{end} >= dateStr) or (#{end} > dateEnd)) and (mName like '%${findStr}%' or siteName like '%${findStr}%') order by orderCode desc limit ${startNo-1}, ${listSize}
mapper.update: update orders set state='예약완료' where orderCode = '${_parameter}'
update orders set state='예약취소' where orderCode = '${_parameter}'
update orders set state='방문완료' where dateEnd='${_parameter}' and state='예약대기'
update orders set state='예약취소' where dateOrder = date_add('${_parameter}', interval 1 day) and payment = '무통장입금' and state='입금대기'
mapper.select: select i.iName, o.itemCode, sum(o.price) as amount, o.dateOrder, count(o.price) as count from orders o join item i on o.itemCode = i.itemCode where o.itemCode = #{itemCode} and (('${dateStr}' <= o.dateOrder) and ('${dateEnd}' >= o.dateOrder )) and (o.state = '예약완료' or o.state = '리뷰완료' or o.state = '방문완료') group by dateOrder order by dateOrder;
